entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming clear overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
